definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
leisure/relaxation/not working/idle/to enjoy leisure/to lie fallow
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
to close the market (for a holiday or overnight etc)

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 过去的那个休赛期，有很多关于科比想被交易的报道。

sentences.english: A truck rear-end our van on the freeway.
sentences.chinese: 在告诉公路上一辆卡车从后面撞上我们的休旅车。

sentences.english: Again the Prince of Orange intervened, and told the university not to be silly.
sentences.chinese: 奥伦治公再一次插手干涉，叫来顿大学休要无知。

sentences.english: I want to take parental leave to look after my baby.
sentences.chinese: 我想休育婴假回家照顾我的宝宝。

sentences.english: See you soon, lots of luv , Sue.
sentences.chinese: 盼早日见到你，非常爱你的，休。

sentences.english: Glebe's old hero bereavement, Hugh death cause.
sentences.chinese: 天荒地老英雄丧，国破家亡事业休。

sentences.english: I spent my holidays travelling to some places near Zhuhai to relax myself.
sentences.chinese: 休了大假，去了珠海附近的地方，一个人散散心。

sentences.english: Only 33 percent of people take all their allotted vacation days.
sentences.chinese: 只有33%的人会休完各项规定假期。

sentences.english: I am six weeks into my maternity leave with my second child.
sentences.chinese: 生完第二个孩子后，我休产假已经休六个星期了。

sentences.english: Though Sue is a green hand, she's completely at grips with the details of her job.
sentences.chinese: 休虽然是生手，但她完全了解她工作的细节。

sentences.english: "Catchword agriculture " can rest Gao Dengyuan spring answer the earth, everythings on earth anabiosises.
sentences.chinese: “口号农业”可以休矣高登元春回大地，万物复苏。

sentences.english: I will have two days off next week.
Only 59 percent of people take all their allotted vacation days.
sentences.chinese: 只有59%的人会休完各项规定假期。

sentences.english: She helped Carol in putting Hugh to bed.
sentences.chinese: 她帮助卡萝尔让休上床睡觉。

sentences.english: She's just a bit run down . I think she needs to take a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 她只是有点累了，我想她需要休几天假。

sentences.english: Only 47 percent of people take all their allotted vacation days.
sentences.chinese: 只有47%的人会休完各项规定假期。

definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]
to entertain/to repay/to return/to reward/to compensate/to reply/to answer
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole
Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
(literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
variant of 喧[xuan1]/old variant of 諼|谖[xuan1]
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
